name: 6K
description:
Our entry for LD42 : "Running out of space"!

6K is a shooter where you shoot stuff with a gun. However be cautious, for the ground is collapsing under your feet! You can scavenge your enemies’ bodies to collect tiles and rebuild the arena.

Controls: 

WASD / ZQSD to move;

Shift to dash;

Mouse1 to shoot;

Mouse2 to place tiles;

R to reload;

Credits:

Art and animations by Laura Nadal 

https://twitter.com/mmem1m

Game design, code, FXs and sound by Nicolas Ceriani

https://twitter.com/nicolas_ceriani

Enjoy!
